name: fontina
content:

a pale yellow cheese made from cow's milk, originally from Italy, with a mild (= not strong)flavour: Fontina is a great cheese for melting and is excellent in grilled sandwiches. Their pizzas use fontina cheese instead of mozzarella.
More examplesFewer examplesCook in the oven for about 10 minutes or until the fontina has melted.I make polenta slowly and stir in some good butter, salt, and grated fontina at the end.Fontina is a semisoft cheese with a sweet, nutty flavour.Top the pasta with breadcrumbs and some grated fontina cheese.Stir the fontina into the cooled mushroom mixture.
